infos.value: I have briefly summarized my explanations. If you could check them, it would be most appreciated.
Through victory, you can procure various spoils of war that would otherwise be unobtainable. By all means, please join in and give it a try.
In the Trials of Reckoning, you can choose between Quests or Boss Battles.
You can earn rewards by completing <color=#00ffff>each mission</color>.
<color=#00ffff>Tickets</color> acquired during Quests can be used to challenge the Boss.
Acquired <color=#00ffff>Medals</color> can be exchanged for <color=#00ffff>Event Summons</color>.
Points acquired from Actions are displayed in a ranking format. You will receive rewards based on your rank once points have been totaled.
